page.title: 02PRIVATE HOUSING
page.content: {The Summerfields Estate.}Building began in 1974. They were then building six different types of houses. These were two-bedroomed, three-bedroomed and four-bedroomed{semi-detached houses. Over the years land prices rose so smaller houses were built. Now one-bedroomed and two-bedroomed {terraced}houses are built, plus two and three bedroomed semi-detached houses, two-bedroomed semi-detached {bungalows}and three and four bedroomed {detached}houses. Construction has changed over the years and two types of houses are now being built:- {timber framed and traditional brick. Both types are found on the estate but it is difficult to tell the difference from the outside.{Wimpey,}the builders provide the first time buyer with fridge, cooker, washing machine and carpets throughout.
